title: Lavender Haze
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:04.22] Meet me at midnight
[00:07.17] 
[00:19.84] Staring at the ceiling with you
[00:23.18] Oh, you don't ever say too much
[00:27.32] 
[00:29.75] And you don't really read into
[00:33.03] My melancholia
[00:36.84] 
[00:40.53] I've been under scrutiny (yeah, oh, yeah)
[00:42.88] You handle it beautifully (yeah, oh, yeah)
[00:45.35] All this shit is new to me (yeah, oh, yeah)
[00:50.35] I feel the lavender haze creeping up on me
[00:55.37] Surreal, I'm damned if I do give a damn what people say
[01:00.12] No deal, the 1950s shit they want from me
[01:05.81] I just wanna stay in that lavender haze
[01:12.22] 
[01:19.42] All they keep asking me (all they keep asking me)
[01:22.54] Is if I'm gonna be your bride
[01:29.16] The only kinda girl they see (only kinda girl they see)
[01:32.42] Is a one night or a wife
[01:37.54] 
[01:39.72] I find it dizzying (yeah, oh, yeah)
[01:42.13] They're bringing up my history (yeah, oh, yeah)
[01:44.61] But you weren't even listening (yeah, oh, yeah)
[01:48.27] Ooh, whoa-oh
[01:49.72] I feel the lavender haze creeping up on me
[01:54.63] Surreal, I'm damned if I do give a damn what people say
[01:59.53] No deal, the 1950s shit they want from me
[02:05.28] I just wanna stay in that lavender haze
[02:12.35] That lavender haze
[02:18.99] Talk your talk and go viral
[02:21.34] I just need this love spiral
[02:23.79] Get it off your chest
[02:26.18] Get it off my desk (get it off my desk)
[02:28.78] Talk your talk and go viral
[02:31.28] I just need this love spiral
[02:33.71] Get it off your chest
[02:36.03] Get it off my desk
[02:39.47] I feel (I feel) the lavender haze creeping up on me
[02:44.16] Surreal, I'm damned if I do give a damn what people say
[02:49.26] No deal (no deal), the 1950s shit they want from me
[02:54.61] I just wanna stay in that lavender haze
[03:01.16] 
[03:03.34] Get it off your chest
[03:05.72] Get it off my desk
[03:09.17] That lavender haze, I just wanna stay
[03:14.41] I just wanna stay in that lavender haze
[03:16.95]
